                    content: "Blockchain representa uma revolução tecnológica para transações seguras e descentralizadas. Você aprenderá sobre criptografia, consenso e smart contracts através de exemplos práticos e projetos reais. Cada conceito será explicado em contexto de aplicações blockchain atuais.",
                    completed: false,
                    locked: true
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
};


==================================================

=== cybersecurity.ts ===

==================================================

=== data-science.ts ===

==================================================

=== devops-docker.ts ===

    id: "devops-docker",
    title: "DevOps e Docker",

==================================================

=== flutter-mobile.ts ===

=== frontend-development.ts ===

==================================================

=== full-stack-development.ts ===

    id: "full-stack-development",

=== gestao-trafego.ts ===

==================================================

=== machine-learning.ts ===

    id: "machine-learning",

==================================================

=== nodejs-apis.ts ===
import { CourseContent } from '../types/course-types';

export const nodejsapisCourse: CourseContent = {
    id: "nodejs-apis",
    title: "Node.js e APIs Backend",
    description: "Curso completo de node.js e apis backend com conteúdo CS50 expandido para 160 aulas",
    category: "Backend",
    level: "Intermediário",
    duration_hours: 130,
    total_modules: 10,
    total_lessons: 160,
    price: 297.00,
    currency: "BRL",
    instructor: "Fenix Academy",
    certificate: true,
    languages: ["pt-BR"],
    tags: ["Node.js e APIs Backend", "Backend", "Programação", "Tecnologia", "CS50"],
    thumbnail: "/images/courses/nodejs-apis.jpg",
    status: "active",
    modules: [
        {
            id: 1,
            title: "Fundamentos do Node.js e Event Loop",
            description: "Módulo 1: Fundamentos do Node.js e Event Loop",
            duration_hours: 13,
            lessons: [
                {
                    id: 1,
                    title: "Aula 1: Fundamentos do Node.js e Event Loop",

=== product-management.ts ===

=== python-data-science.ts ===

export const pythondatascienceCourse: CourseContent = {
    id: "python-data-science",

==================================================

=== react-advanced.ts ===
import { CourseContent } from '../types/course-types';

export const reactadvancedCourse: CourseContent = {
    id: "react-advanced",
    title: "React Avançado e Moderno",
    description: "Curso completo de react avançado e moderno com conteúdo CS50 expandido para 160 aulas",
    category: "Frontend",
    level: "Avançado",
    duration_hours: 130,
    total_modules: 10,
    total_lessons: 160,
    price: 297.00,
    currency: "BRL",
    instructor: "Fenix Academy",
    certificate: true,
    languages: ["pt-BR"],
    tags: ["React Avançado e Moderno", "Frontend", "Programação", "Tecnologia", "CS50"],
    thumbnail: "/images/courses/react-advanced.jpg",
    status: "active",
    modules: [
        {
            id: 1,
            title: "Fundamentos Avançados do React",
            description: "Módulo 1: Fundamentos Avançados do React",
            duration_hours: 13,
            lessons: [
                {
                    id: 1,
                    title: "Aula 1: Fundamentos Avançados do React",

=== react-native-mobile.ts ===

=== software-architecture.ts ===
import { CourseContent } from '../types/course-types';

export const softwarearchitectureCourse: CourseContent = {
    id: "software-architecture",
    title: "Software Architecture",
    description: "Curso completo de software architecture com conteúdo CS50 expandido para 160 aulas",

==================================================

=== ui-ux-design.ts ===
import { CourseContent } from '../types/course-types';

export const uiuxdesignCourse: CourseContent = {
    id: "ui-ux-design",
    title: "UI/UX Design",
    description: "Curso completo de ui/ux design com conteúdo CS50 expandido para 160 aulas",
    category: "Design",
    level: "Intermediário",
    duration_hours: 130,
    total_modules: 10,
    total_lessons: 160,
    price: 297.00,
    currency: "BRL",
    instructor: "Fenix Academy",
    certificate: true,
    languages: ["pt-BR"],
    tags: ["UI/UX Design", "Design", "Programação", "Tecnologia", "CS50"],
    thumbnail: "/images/courses/ui-ux-design.jpg",
    status: "active",
    modules: [
